About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am an Electrical Engineering and Computer Science student at the University of New South Wales (UNSW). I hope to use this space to highlight some projects I have completed and discuss some of my interests.

Areas of intrest

I have deep interests in a number of areas of electrical engineering, in particular signal processing, embedded systems and electronics. The signal processing and embedded systems fields tie closely with my computer science experience, complementing and enhancing each other. Particularly I enjoy making use of machine learning and neural networks to solve problems.

Experience

My experience so far has been quite diverse, having worked in power engineering at Transport for NSW/Sydney Trains, digital signal processing at Dolby Laboratories and teaching as a casual academic at UNSW.

In the works

Completing my final year of university.
Gaining signal processing and software engineering experience at Dolby Laboratories.
Planning my exchange semester abroad.
